# runAction(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an action to the list of actions executed by the node.

## Declaration

```swift
func runAction(_ action: SCNAction)
```

## Parameters

- **action**: The action to be performed.

## Discussion

SceneKit begins running a newly added action when it prepares to render the next frame.

## Running Actions

- **runAction(_:completionHandler:)**: Adds an action to the list of actions executed by the node. SceneKit calls the specified block when the action completes.
- **runAction(_:forKey:)**: Adds an identifiable action to the list of actions executed by the node.
- **runAction(_:forKey:completionHandler:)**: Adds an identifiable action to the list of actions executed by the node. SceneKit calls the specified block when the action completes.
